(:action get ; Get a resource and update entity's status
:parameters (?actor - entity ?resource - object ?location - place)
:precondition (and
                (at ?actor ?location)
                (recognizes ?actor ?resource ?location))
:effect (and
          (has ?actor ?resource)
          (not (needs ?actor ?resource))

(:action drink ; Drink a liquid and update the state of the person
  :parameters (?npc - person ?liquid - liquid)
  :precondition (and (thirsty ?npc) (has ?npc ?liquid) (safe_to_drink ?liquid))
  :effect (and (not (thirsty ?npc))

(:action collect ; Collect resources and update their status
    :parameters (?collector - person ?source1 - resource ?source2 - resource ?container - container)
    :precondition (and (available ?collector) (provides ?source1) (provides ?source2) (empty ?container))
    :effect (and (possess ?collector ?container) (filled_with ?container ?source1) (filled_with ?container ?source2) (not (empty ?container))
